name: Mad Princess: The Great Gladiators
storyline:
An Empire at the peak of prosperity. In cities with large populations, governance is carried out by means of Coliseum tournaments.

This game is set in the Imperial city of Caertina, where they hold extreme bestiarii events. Beasts are caught in great numbers from the nearby wilderness, trained, and pitted against gladiators.

You are a criminal detained in the Imperial city prison and forced to fight as a gladiator. In order to be released from that hell, you must survive the grueling battles you are put through one after another.
summary: Choose your own path in this gladiator role-playing game. The player starts off as an incarcerated criminal, forced to fight for their life. After they leave the prison, they will embark on a journey to sharpen their skills.
